column4: Is there an easy way to downgrade the kernel in precise. It appears the current kernel has issues with my wifi device driver
You could pin/use older kernel versions that are in the same release. but going earlier then that.. may be harder.
theres also ppa's for newer kernels that might fix the issue sooner.
seems the bug is being worked on..  its possible a fix may be out  in the next few days.. (hard to tell how long this stuff will take)
